name: OneeChan Emoji
description:
For those of you who want emoji without the OneeChan!

Just pick the options you want and they should show up next to your name when you post. All you have to do is put your preference anywhere in the email field:
"rabite"
"neko"
"sega"
"sakamoto"
"ponyo"
"baka"
"yuno"
"arch"
"centos"
"debian"
"freebsd"
"gentoo"
"fedora"
"mint"
"osx"
"rhel"
"sabayon"
"trisquel"
"slackware"
"ubuntu"
"windows"
"openbsd"
"gnu"
"plan" (Plan9)
"crunch" (Crunchbang)
